code: import{useContext}from'react';import{useNavigate,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{ThemeContext}from'../context/ThemeContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NotFound=()=>{const{isDark}=useContext(ThemeContext);const navigate=useNavigate();const location=useLocation();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container mx-auto mt-12 px-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"".concat(isDark?'bg-gray-800':'bg-white'," rounded-xl shadow-2xl p-12 max-w-2xl mx-auto text-center"),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-9xl font-bold text-blue-600 mb-4",children:"404"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-3xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Page Not Found"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-xl mb-4 ".concat(isDark?'text-gray-400':'text-gray-600'),children:"The page you're looking for doesn't exist."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-sm mb-8 ".concat(isDark?'text-gray-500':'text-gray-500'," font-mono"),children:["Requested URL: ",location.pathname]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex gap-4 justify-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate('/'),className:"bg-blue-600 text-white px-8 py-4 rounded-lg text-xl font-semibold hover:bg-blue-700 transition",children:"Go Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate('/tasks'),className:"".concat(isDark?'bg-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-600':'bg-gray-200 hover:bg-gray-300'," px-8 py-4 rounded-lg text-xl font-semibold transition"),children:"View Tasks"})]})]})});};export default NotFound;
